channel.title: A few topics im stumped on =)
channel.description:
:) ;) :D swintell soft :mad: :eek: :cool:
Hi I am curently working on my server v2 and I switched sources to Runescape 3 wich is based off of rune-server =) heres what I want to add to my server it is silabs but i want to add a store that you get skills capes and also I changed the spawn piont after you do toturial island to the druid area and I want to add most all shops there also when i try to spawn silab capes it doenst do anything can someone help me please =( also i would like to add npc in the spawn areas that shout were mini games are ect can anyone help with some of these problems
